name: openapi
description: This repository contains [OpenAPI specifications][openapi] for Stripe's API.

scripts.bundle: npm run build:modules && redocly bundle space-platform-api.yaml -o space-platform-api.bundle.tmp.yaml && mv space-platform-api.bundle.tmp.yaml space-platform-api.yaml && mkdir -p bundles && ln -sf ../space-platform-api.yaml bundles/complete-api.yaml
scripts.build-docs: npm run bundle && redocly build-docs space-platform-api.yaml -o docs/index.html
scripts.ci:spec: npm run lint && npm run bundle
